name: CoinCollector (jael137)
description:
Made for the JTAGame Jam #4 In 4 days by Jael137!

The theme of this jam was: "Take 1 leave the rest".
I incorporated this theme by allowing you to only hold a single tool at a time. You leave all other tools behind, but can pick them up later.

Goal

Collect all 100 coins to win! Fight monsters, Find chests and complete challenges to collect coins. If you die, you can get your tool back at the place where you died.

Controls

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move.

Press Z to interact (Open chests, Pickup items, Read signs)
Press X to use your current tool (You can only hold 1 at a time)
Press C to drop your current tool.
